title: The Mysterious Murder
story: It was a dark and stormy night at the grand mansion on Haunted Hill.
Earlier that day, a rich and prominent member of the community, Mr. Johnson, had been found dead in the study. The police were called, and now Detective Smith was on the case.
Detective Smith arrived at the mansion, determined to unravel the mystery and find the killer.

suspect.name: Mrs. Black
suspect.alibi: Mrs. Black claims that she was in her bedroom when the murder occurred.
suspect.confirmation: However, the detective noticed that there was no one else in the mansion who could corroborate her alibi.

witness.name: Butler James
witness.observation: Butler James claims that he saw someone running away from the study just moments before he discovered the body.
witness.description: The butler described the person as tall and wearing a black coat.

npcs.name: Maid Emily
npcs.dialogue: I was in the kitchen preparing dinner when I heard a loud noise from the study.

npcs.name: Gardener Tom
npcs.dialogue: I was working in the garden all day. I didn't see or hear anything unusual.

clues.Front Door: The front door was locked from the inside, indicating that the killer might still be in the mansion.
clues.Library Door: The library door was found ajar, suggesting that someone had been inside recently.
clues.Kitchen Door: The kitchen door was locked, ruling out any immediate escape from that route.
clues.Lobby: In the mansion's lobby, the detective discovered a muddy footprint, possibly left by the killer.
